text: Avlida railway station () is a railway station in Vathy, Euboea, Greece. It is owned by OSE, but service are provided by TrainOSE, through Proastiakos from Athens to Chalcis.Proastiakos timetable 2020 ==History== The station opened in 1904, along with the rest of the line, now part on the Athens to Chalcis service of Proastiakos. ==Service== The station is served by Proastiakos, with frequent services to Athens, Oinoi and Chalcis. ==Station layout== {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=50 valign=top|Ground level |style="border-top:solid 2px gray;border- bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100 valign=top|Customer service |style="border- top:solid 2px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=285 valign=top|Exit/Tickets |- |style="border-bottom:solid 2px gray;" rowspan=5 valign=top|Level Ε1 |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-right:solid 2px gray;border- left:solid 2px gray;border-bottom:solid 2px gray;" colspan=2| Side platform, doors will open on the right |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Platform 1 |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Non-regular use |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Platform 2Α |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|→ towards (Kalochori-Panteichi) ← |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Platform 2B |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|→ towards (Chalcis) → |- |style="border-top:solid 2px gray;border-right:solid 2px gray;border-left:solid 2px gray;border-bottom:solid 2px gray;" colspan=2|Side platform, doors will open on the right/left |} ==References== Category:Transport in Euboea (regional unit) Category:Railway stations in Central Greece Category:Railway stations opened in 1904
title: Avlida railway station
